# Changelog
Notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## Version 0.0.3 - January 6 2026

- Added "verbose" argument to allow for printing menu and action to CLI.
    - Defaults to False


## Version 0.0.2 - December 22 2025

- Changed "return_message" optional defaulting to "Exit".
- Minor format changes.

## Version 0.0.1 - December 22 2025

- Initial release.
